Articles.Content: Ever needed a Kerbal for something cool that needs a crew? A model rocket launch, for instance? Well, look no further! I present to you all The InstaKerb! Simply cut out a Kerbal and use him however you want! for best results use Card Stock.
Yes, it's just the same Kerbal on a piece of paper a bunch of times.
Why not format it, then make another page with the reverse pattern with the back of said Kerbal? Then someone could print one side, flip the page over and print the second one on the other side?
I kinda wanna see if I can make Kerbal stickers with this...

Oh those would make superb bumper stickers.

"My other car is powered by More Boosters!"

"Wave when you reach Minmus!"

"This is not a heap 'o scrap - I just need another couple of struts."

etc.
"My other car is on the Mun"

"My other car is on the Mun"

....I want this so bad now.

"Jebediah is my copilot"

"Kod is my copilot"

"My other car is a rocket"

"If you can read this, run!"

"How's my flying? Call 1800-SCREAMING DEATH"

"For SCIEEEENCE!"

"Born to fly!"

"Kerbal Fi: do or die!"

"My rocket, right or wrong."

"On the wings of the wind."

"Audaces Fortuna juvat!"

"Fortune favors the bold!"

"Join the Corps: the Kerbanaut Corps!"

"Be Kerbal Strong."

"We need volunteers!"

-Duxwing

A red sticker that says:

'If this is blue, your going too fast!'

Yeh, physx

There already is a KSP bumper sticker (maybe multiple? I dunno)

And yes, this is on my car.

I like the idea of more designs though

"Honk if you have boosters."

"Certified by J. Kerman"

"I do this for SCIENCE!"

"I brake for lithobrakers."

"I need more delta-V."

"My other car was eaten by the Kraken."

I'd use a "My other car is on the Mun" sticker.

If I had a (full size) car IRL.

I have quite a few matchbox ones...
